title: Let's Meet
overview: A drama about the reunion of a couple of childhood friends as the key to creating a beautiful modern love story. A young screenwriter and director Ji Qiu and the shooter Zhou Zi Qian, who recently returned to China, meet at a shooting range due to a misunderstanding. What she didn't realize was that this tall boy in front of her was the little boy who used to hide behind her. Later, Ji Qiu's new entertainment show "Let's Meet" gave them the opportunity to interact in work and life. This couple, who have passed the stage of love and hate, gradually get to know each other more.
